desc.eng: This battle track will end at ${date}, and you will not be able purchase it after this date.
desc.trans: 此戰鬥通行證將於${date}結束，之後將無法購買。

desc1.eng: battle track will remain available for unlock and redeem daily ${days} days after your first login date (${firstDay}), regardless of the end date.
desc1.trans: 在您首次登入日期(${firstDay})後，戰鬥通行證將保持可解鎖和兌換每日獎勵${days}天，無論結束日期為何。

desc2.eng: Once the redeemable days are over, you will not be able to unlock or redeem the rewards anymore. so make sure you login and redeem your rewards before the redeemable days are over.
desc2.trans: 在可兌換天數結束後，您將無法再解鎖或兌換獎勵，所以請確保在可兌換天數結束前登入並兌換您的獎勵。

desc.eng: This battle track is a ${days} days track. by unlocking this track, you will unlock the current period of the track. and you will be able to unlock it again if its still available in the next period.
desc.trans: 這個戰鬥通行證是${days}天的通行證，解鎖後您將獲得該期的獎勵。如果此通行證下一期仍可購買，您將能夠再次解鎖它。

tip1.eng: Looks like one or more of your mercenary is low level, you should level them up to match your level using ${item1} and ${item2}
tip1.trans: 看起來你的傭兵中有一個或多個等級較低，你應該使用${item1}和${item2}來提升他們的等級，以達到與你相同的等級。

description.eng: More experienced pro mercs hang out here
description.trans: 更有經驗的職業傭兵聚集在這裡

description.eng: Usually amateur mercs hang out here
description.trans: 通常業餘傭兵會在這裡聚集

description.eng: Professional mercs likes discuss about their gig here
description.trans: 職業傭兵喜歡在這裡討論他們的任務。

description.eng: Attacks the enemy for ${amount} health points
description.trans: 對敵人造成${amount}生命點數的攻擊

description.eng: Attacks the enemy for ${amount}
description.trans: 對敵人造成${amount}點傷害

description.eng: Burns targeted enemy for ${amount} damage for ${turns} turns
description.trans: 對目標敵人造成${amount}點傷害，持續${turns}回合

description.eng: Burns all enemies for ${amount} damage for ${turns} turns
description.trans: 對所有敵人造成${amount}點傷害，持續${turns}回合

triggered.eng: ${merc} burns all enemies, dealt ${damage} damage each
triggered.trans: ${merc}燃燒所有敵人，每個敵人受到${damage}的傷害

description.eng: Heals your character for ${amount} health point
description.trans: 治療你的角色${amount}生命值

description.eng: Heals your team for ${amount} health
description.trans: 治療您的團隊${amount}點生命值

description.eng: Poisons the enemy for ${amount} for ${turn} turns
description.trans: 對敵人施加毒素，持續${turn}回合，每回合造成${amount}傷害

description.eng: Poisons all enemies for ${amount} for ${turns} turns
description.trans: 對所有敵人施加${amount}的毒素，持續${turns}回合

triggered.eng: ${merc} poisoned all enemies, dealt ${damage} damage each.
triggered.trans: ${merc} 毒害了所有敵人，${enemy} 受到了 ${damage} 點傷害。

description.eng: Recharge your character's shield for ${amount}
description.trans: 為您的角色充能${amount}的護盾

description.eng: Shields your team for ${amount} health
description.trans: 為您的隊伍護盾增加${amount}生命值

damageOverTimeDescription.eng: This ability will deal damage over time, this kind of ability usually has less damage than one-strike abilities, however, it deals more damage in total over time.
damageOverTimeDescription.trans: 這個能力會隨著時間造成傷害，這種能力通常傷害比一次性能力低，但是總體而言隨著時間會造成更多傷害。

groupTargetAllyDescription.eng: This ability is multi-target and will target all alive allies, this kind of ability is usually weaker than single target abilities however, it would be more effective against multiple allies.
groupTargetAllyDescription.trans: 這個能力可以對多個目標使用，並會針對所有存活的盟友，這種能力通常比單一目標的能力弱，但對多個盟友來說更有效。

groupTargetEnemyDescription.eng: This ability is multi-target and will target all alive enemies, this kind of ability is usually weaker than single target abilities however, it would be more effective against multiple enemies.
groupTargetEnemyDescription.trans: 這個能力可以對多個目標造成傷害，通常比單一目標能力較弱，但對付多個敵人時會更有效。

singleTargetAllyDescription.eng: This ability is single target and will target yourself but not your allies.
singleTargetAllyDescription.trans: 這個能力只能針對單一目標，並且會以自己為目標，而不是盟友。

singleTargetEnemyDescription.eng: This ability is single target and will target one enemy, this kind of ability is usually stronger than multi-target abilities however, it would be less effective against multiple enemies.
singleTargetEnemyDescription.trans: 這個能力是單一目標的，會對一個敵人使用，這種能力通常比多目標能力更強大，但對抗多個敵人時效果會較弱。

warning.eng: This action is irreversible and will permanently delete your account and all associated data. Proceed with caution.
warning.trans: 此操作不可逆，將永久刪除您的帳戶及所有相關數據。請謹慎操作。

success.eng: Account successfully linked with Apple Account
success.trans: 帳號已成功連結至Apple帳號
帳號已成功與電子郵件連結

alreadyInUse.eng: Cannot link account with this credential because it is already associated with another account
alreadyInUse.trans: 無法使用此憑證連結帳號，因為它已與另一個帳號關聯。

success.eng: Account successfully linked with Google Account
success.trans: 帳號已成功與Google帳號連結

blocked.eng: This apartment cannot entered at this moment.

enterNotIdle.eng: You can only enter an apartment when you are idle
enterNotIdle.trans: 只有在閒置時才能進入公寓。

blocked.eng: This player cannot be invited at this moment.
blocked.trans: 此玩家目前無法被邀請。

notEnoughMoney.eng: You do not have enough money to rent this apartment.
notEnoughMoney.trans: 您沒有足夠的資金來租這間公寓。

success.eng: You have started the apartment rental.

title.eng: Apartment rental fee ${amount} has not been paid and your apartment has been removed
title.trans: 公寓租金${amount}未繳納，您的公寓已被移除。

title.eng: Apartment rental fee ${amount} has been deducted from your account
title.trans: 您的帳戶已扣除公寓租金費用 ${amount}

warning.eng: This will permanently delete all messages in your apartment chat. This action cannot be undone.
warning.trans: 此操作將永久刪除您公寓聊天中的所有訊息，並且不可復原。

error.eng: You must be the owner of the apartment to access the kitchen
error.trans: 您必須是公寓的主人才能進入廚房

description.eng: view available apartments online
description.trans: 線上查看可用公寓

description.eng: View available apartments online
description.trans: 線上查看可用公寓

error.eng: The owner of this apartment must add you as a friend for you to send messages in this apartment.
error.trans: 這間公寓的主人必須先將你加為好友，才能在此公寓內發送訊息。

warning.eng: This will immediately terminate your apartment lease. You will NOT receive a refund.
warning.trans: 注意：本操作將立即終止您的租賃。您不會收到退款。

confirmDescription.eng: Are you sure you want to rent this apartment? if you already have an apartment, it will be dismissed.
confirmDescription.trans: 你確定要租這間公寓嗎？如果你已經有一間公寓，它將被取消。

arrestReward.eng: If you arrest a wanted player, you will receive rewards from ACPD
arrestReward.trans: 若你逮捕通緝玩家，將從 ACPD 獲得獎勵

description.eng: You are about to arrest a wanted criminal.
description.trans: 你即將逮捕一名通緝犯。

instruction.trans: 按住並釋放以進行攻擊

attackNonHostile.eng: You will be marked as Hostile for attacking non-hostile players
attackNonHostile.trans: 攻擊非敵對玩家將被標記為敵對

attackNoneWanted.eng: You will be wanted by the ACPD for attacking a player thats not wanted
attackNoneWanted.trans: 你將因攻擊一名未被通緝的玩家而被ACPD通緝

description.eng: You are about to engage in hostile combat. This action cannot be undone.
description.trans: 您即將進入敵對戰鬥。此行動無法撤回。

desc.eng: Increase firearm damage.
Increase energy weapon damage
Increase melee damage.
Increases health

description.eng: Calibrate to calibration level ${caliLevel}
description.trans: 校準至校準等級${caliLevel}

tipv2.eng: Automatically calibrate and repair your item until it have successfully calibrated it once, or if you stopped the process.\nKeep in mind that this process will automatically repair your equipment with ${repairItem}.
tipv2.trans: 自動校準並修復您的物品，直至成功校準一次，或直到您停止流程為止。請注意，此流程將會使用${repairItem}自動修復您的裝備

tip.eng: You can unlock higher gathering zones by clearing ${difficulty} strongholds, the zone level is capped at your character level.
tip.trans: 你可以透過清除${difficulty}地城來解鎖更高的採集區域，該區域的等級上限為你的角色等級。

duplicateTraits.eng: You cannot select the same trait more than once

emptyTraits.eng: You must select a prefix for each slot
emptyTraits.trans: 每個插槽都必須選擇一個前綴詞

expectedChance.eng: The expected chance for this specific combination of prefixes is ${percentFrom}% ~ ${percentTo}%
expectedChance.trans: 此特定組合的前綴預期機率為 ${percentFrom}% ~ ${percentTo}%

tip.eng: The chances of rolling traits is exactly the same as manually re-rolling, this is just a automatic re-roll feature for convenience.
tip.trans: 抽取特質的機率與手動重新抽取完全相同，這只是一個自動重新抽取的功能，以方便玩家。

cancelConfirmDescription.eng: Material and time consumed will be lost.
cancelConfirmDescription.trans: 材料和時間消耗將會遺失。

description.eng: Click to choose a task
description.trans: 點擊以選擇任務。

description.eng: Here shows all your tasks that you are performing.
description.trans: 這裡顯示了正在執行的所有任務

description.eng: Mirai; Once a picturesque tourist haven, it now stands abandoned, ravaged by soaring crime rates and leaked radiation. In this desolate landscape, only a handful of desperate junkies and ruthless mercenaries remain, scavenging for whatever loot they can find amidst the ruins.
description.trans: 未來之城；曾經是一個風景如畫的旅遊勝地，如今卻被犯罪率飆升和外洩的輻射所摧毀。在這片荒涼的景象中，只有少數絕望的吸毒者和無情的傭兵留下來，在廢墟中尋找他們能找到的任何戰利品。

description.eng: Safeguard high-profile clients, engage in high-octane combat, and use advanced tech to ensure protection amidst urban dystopia.
description.trans: 在都市末世中使用先進技術參與高強度戰鬥，以保護高知名度的客戶。

description.eng: Contribute to gang maintenance
description.trans: 貢獻給幫派維護

description.eng: Work as a part-time extraction force for Trauma Team, with the only goal of extracting ensured client from lethal situations.
description.trans: 在創傷小隊中擔任兼職救援部隊，唯一目標是從危急情況中救出客戶。

description.eng: Navigate hazardous junkyards, uncover hidden treasures, and salvage valuable tech
description.trans: 探索危險的垃圾場，尋找隱藏的寶藏，並回收值錢的科技

description.eng: Contribute to territory control for your gang
description.trans: 為您的幫派貢獻領地控制

description.eng: Infiltrate fortified corporate facilities, hack systems, and pilfer cutting-edge tech & secrets, all to satisfy shadowy clients' demands.
description.trans: 滲透堅固的企業設施，駭入系統，並竊取尖端科技和機密，只為了滿足神秘客戶的需求。

description.eng: Upgrade your slots to increase the amount of background tasks you can run at the same time.
description.trans: 升級您的插槽以增加您可以同時進行的背景任務數量。

description.eng: Items collected in stronghold are stored in your backpack, if you died, the items in backpack will be used as deposit to revive you, you can buy back your items from the Clinic.
description.trans: 在地城中收集的物品將儲存在您的背包中，如果您死亡，背包中的物品將被用作保證金來復活您，您可以從診所買回您的物品。

description.eng: Receive various rewards daily for 21 days, and up to ${itemName} at the 22th day

unlockBattlePassDescription.trans: 解鎖此戰鬥通行證，以獲得${tier}的獎勵。

1.trans: 看起來你的一些裝備仍然處於+${cali}校準等級或更低。你應該在物品校準介面使用${calibrator}將它們校準至至少+${targetCali}校準等級。

body.eng: Your gang has collapsed due to lack of resources and funds.
body.trans: 由於缺乏資源與資金，你的幫派已解散。

upkeepTip.trans: 確保有足夠的資源和資金，以避免在下一次維護日期失去幫派。

transferOwnershipConfirm.eng: Are you sure you want to transfer ownership of the gang to ${playerName}?\nthis cannot be undone.
transferOwnershipConfirm.trans: 你確定要將幫派所有權轉移給${playerName}嗎？\n這將無法撤銷。

description.eng: Are you sure you want to join the gang with the name "${name}" and tag "${tag}"?
description.trans: 你確定要加入名為"${name}"，標籤為"${tag}"的幫派嗎？

description.eng: Are you sure you want to send a request to join the gang with the name "${name}" and tag "${tag}"?
description.trans: 您確定要發送請求加入名為"${name}"、標籤為"${tag}"的幫派嗎？

noNotes.eng: You have not collected any lore notes yet.
noNotes.trans: 您尚未收集到任何背景故事。

notEnoughPsyche.eng: Your cyber-psychosis level is too high to engage in fights
notEnoughPsyche.trans: 你的電馭狂躁症程度過高，無法參與戰鬥

description.eng: You are currently protected from PVP by ${item}, if you attack others now you will lose the buff, are you sure you want to proceed?
description.trans: 目前你正受到${item}的PVP保護，如果現在攻擊其他玩家，將會失去此增益效果，你確定要繼續嗎？

description.eng: You are under PVP protection until level ${level}, but if you actively engaged in PVP your PVP protection will be removed
description.trans: 在達到${level}級之前，您將受到PVP保護，但如果您主動參與PVP，將會移除您的PVP保護。

blockFailed.eng: ${player} tried to block damage from ${enemyName} but failed, received ${damage} damage
blockFailed.trans: ${player}試圖格擋${enemyName}的攻擊，但失敗了，受到了${damage}點傷害

blockSuccess.trans: ${player}成功格擋${blockedPercent}%來自${enemyName}的攻擊，但仍承受${damage}傷害。

description1.eng: Server is restarting for update or unstable connection.
description1.trans: 伺服器正在進行更新或連線不穩定，將重新啟動。

description2.eng: In case of server restarts, it usually will be done within a few minutes.
description2.trans: 如果伺服器重新啟動，通常會在幾分鐘內完成。

description.eng: No internet connection or server is restarting for update. Please try again later.
description.trans: 無網路連線或伺服器正在進行更新，請稍後再試。

title.trans: 重新連線至主機...第 ${attempt} 次嘗試

description2.trans: 全部系統運作正常，請待命...

description2.eng: This will not consume network data.

description.eng: This content can be edited by anyone, and is not official. \nclick here to submit your edit!
description.trans: 此內容可由任何人編輯，並非官方內容。 \n點擊這裡上傳您的編輯！

title.eng: This content is contributable by community, click here to edit or add your own content into the game.
title.trans: 這個內容可以由社群共同補充，點擊這裡來編輯或新增您自己的內容到遊戲

alreadyRedeemed.eng: You have already redeemed this coupon.
alreadyRedeemed.trans: 您已經兌換過這張優惠券了。

description.trans: 輸入您的優惠碼以獲得獎勵。

tip.eng: You can also craft directly from your inventory
tip.trans: 你也可以直接從你的倉庫製作物品

description.eng: Create your own gang and invite your friends to join!
description.trans: 建立您的幫派並邀請朋友加入。

description.eng: The Netcoin currency, can be obtained in game and from premium store
description.trans: Netcoin貨幣，可以在高級商店和遊戲中獲得

description.eng: A device that can be used to locate hidden hideouts.
description.trans: 可定位隱藏據點的裝置。

description.eng: A nano-machine injection device created by Taixing Cybernetics, providing unparalleled upgrades to cybernetic abilities. Inject into the neck for enhanced performance.
description.trans: 由台芯電馭製造的奈米機器注射裝置，為電馭能力提供無與倫比的升級。注射到頸部以提高性能。

description.eng: Neural Upgrade Augmenter is a cutting-edge implant that enables users to break past their mental limitations and reach untold levels of cognitive enhancement. With the ability to exceed typical neural barriers, users can unlock new levels of insight, creativity, and physical performance.
description.trans: 神經升級增強器是一種尖端的植入物，使用者能夠突破心智限制，達到前所未有的認知增強水準。有了超越神經障礙的能力，使用者在洞察力、創造力和體能表現上都能打破過往的限制。

description.eng: A common currency that can be obtained from in game easily
description.trans: 一種可以在遊戲中輕易獲得的通用貨幣

description.eng: Universal Dollars can be exchanged from Netcoin at a 1:1 ratio.
description.trans: 通用幣可以用1:1的比例兌換網幣。

body.eng: Today's Daily Reward Awaits! Log in and Claim Your Reward Now! 🌟
body.trans: 今天的每日獎勵已經準備好了！立即登入並領取你的獎勵吧！🌟

description.eng: This will reset your daily reward progress and randomize the reward items
description.trans: 這將重置您的每日獎勵進度並隨機分配獎勵物品。

title.eng: Are you sure you want to re-roll?

itemLost.eng: ${amount} items from backpack was taken as compensation to Ripperdoc
itemLost.trans: 已從背包中拿走${amount}件物品作為給電馭醫生的費用。

upgradeItemHint.eng: Try level up and upgrade your items

upgradeMercenary.trans: 升級或雇用更多的傭兵。

line.eng: I ain't doing charity here yo

description.eng: Are you sure you want to give up all your items? this is permanent and cannot be undone
description.trans: 你確定要放棄所有物品嗎？這將是永久性的，無法撤銷。

description.eng: Are you sure you want to delete this character? this action is permanent and cannot be undone.
description.trans: 您確定要刪除此角色嗎？此操作是永久性的，無法撤銷。

clanChatDescription.trans: 幫派聊天只有在您是幫派成員時才可用。

notIdle.eng: You must be idle to dismantle items

unlockHint.eng: Click a locked slot to unlock (Lv ${level} + ${price} ${currency})

subtitle.eng: Drag the leaver down to active

actionWhileHasEnemy.eng: You cannot perform this action while there are enemies nearby

enemyInRoom2.eng: You cannot perform this action while there are enemies nearby

maxLootLevelDifference.eng: You cannot loot this chest because your level is too high
maxLootLevelDifference.trans: 你無法搜索這個寶箱，因為你的等級太高了。

noKey.eng: This chest is locked. Find a key to open it!
noKey.trans: 此寶箱已被鎖住。請尋找鑰匙開啟！

description.eng: Hard difficulty stronghold, Enemies are stronger and more numerous, but the EXP and rewards are greater.
description.trans: 困難難度的地城，敵人更強大且更多，但經驗值和獎勵更豐厚。

description.eng: Normal difficulty stronghold.
description.trans: 普通地城。

desc.eng: Increase damage dealt.
Increase defense, takes less damage from enemies.
desc.trans: 增加防禦力，減少來自敵人的傷害。

desc.eng: Increase number of enemies.
Increase exp gained.
Increase loot gained.
Increase drop quality

territoryGang.eng: Strongholds created by member of ${gangName} in this district will receive extra buff
territoryGang.trans: 由 ${gangName} 成員所建立的地城在這個地區將會獲得額外的強化效果。

territoryNoGang.eng: Control this territory to get extra buff in this district
territoryNoGang.trans: 掌控此區域可在此地區獲得額外增益效果。

noHealing.eng: Looks like your are running low on healing items, purchase some so you can it in the stronghold
noHealing.trans: 看起來您的回復物品不足，購買一些以在地城中使用。

notEnoughResources.eng: You do not have enough resources, you may try ${difficulty} instead, ${error}
notEnoughResources.trans: 你沒有足夠的資源，你可以嘗試${difficulty}，${error}

description.eng: Are you sure you want to bring them into stronghold? \nIf you die you will lose them.
description.trans: 您確定要帶它們進地城嗎？\n如果您死了，物品就會消失。

title.eng: there are items in your backpack

message.eng: Seems like your are running low on healing items such as ${item1} or ${item2}\nIt's recommended to purchase some from ${npc} before entering strongholds
message.trans: 看起來你的治療物品，像是${item1}或${item2}，都快用完了\n建議在進入地城前，先從${npc}購買一些。

description.eng: Are you sure you want to leave the dungeon?\nItems you collected will be moved to your inventory safely.
description.trans: 你確定要離開地城嗎？\n你收集的物品將會被安全地移至你的倉庫。

description.eng: This event triggers rarely when you are exploring and fighting enemies
description.trans: 此事件在您探索和戰鬥敵人時很少觸發

unlockDescription.eng: Receive reward by solving the minigame

desc.eng: Has higher damage than normal enemies
Has higher health than normal enemies
desc.trans: 比普通敵人有更高的生命值

1.eng: To ensure the best survivability and damage, equip the best equipment you have. you can also purchase equipments from ${npc} cheaply
1.trans: 為了確保最佳的生存能力和傷害，裝備你擁有的最好裝備。你也可以從${npc}便宜地購買裝備。

3.eng: Seems like some of your equipments are still at ${tierType} tier or lower. You should upgrade them to at least ${targetTier} tier by using ${upgradeItem} at the item upgrade interface
3.trans: 看起來你的一些裝備仍然處於${tierType}等級或更低。你應該在物品升級介面使用${upgradeItem}將它們升級至至少${targetTier}等級。

description1.eng: Error report has been sent to the developer. \nIf this error persists, please contact the developer
description1.trans: 出錯回報已送出給開發者。\n如果問題還是存在，請跟開發者聯絡。

description.eng: A update has been installed, please restart the game. \nIf this page persists, please contact the developer at ${email}
description.trans: 已安裝更新，請重新啟動遊戲。\n如果此頁面持續出現，請聯繫開發人員，電子郵件：${email}

dialog1.eng: Complete the survey to earn rewards! 😊 I would love to hear your feedback!
dialog1.trans: 完成調查以獲得獎勵！😊 我很樂意聽取您的意見！

dialog2.eng: Sorry about the bad experience 😢 I would love to hear your feedback!🙏
dialog2.trans: 對於您的不愉快經歷感到抱歉 😢 我很樂意聽取您的回饋！🙏

dialog3.eng: Thank you! if you could rate on the app store, it would help me a lot! 🙏
dialog3.trans: 謝謝！如果您能在應用商店給予評價，對我來說會非常有幫助！🙏

lowStarComment.eng: How can I improve to earn 5 stars?

lowStarCommentHint.trans: 您在這裡寫的內容將直接傳送給我 :)

question1.eng: What do you think about the design of the game interface?

question2.eng: Do you like to receive free rewards?

statement.eng: No matter whats your answer, you will always get the reward 💯

bountyAddedNotify.eng: A bounty has been placed on your head, current bounty - Eurodollar: ${money}, Universal Dollar: ${uni}

description.eng: Join the fight for justice in Arclight City! The ACPD calls upon vigilant citizens to aid in the pursuit of wanted criminals. Your city needs you! Bring in the fugitives, dead or alive, and earn substantial rewards. Together, we'll make Arclight City safer for all. 🌃👮‍♂️\n#CitizenArrest #ACPDJustice
description.trans: 加入幻光之城為正義而戰吧！幻光警局呼籲警覺的市民協助追捕通緝犯。您的城市需要您！不論生死，將逃犯繩之以法將獲得豐厚的獎勵。讓我們一起打造更安全的幻光之城。🌃👮‍♂️\n#市民逮捕 #幻光警局之義

noPlayers.eng: No criminals with active arrest warrant.

locationNotCleared2.eng: To raid gang hideout at level ${playerLevel}, you must clear the level ${levelNeeded} ${difficulty} difficulty stronghold first, you can unlock higher level strongholds by clearing ${difficulty} strongholds a level below it.
locationNotCleared2.trans: 要突襲等級 ${playerLevel} 的幫派據點，你必須先清除等級 ${levelNeeded} ${difficulty} 難度的地城，你可以透過清除比它低一級的 ${difficulty} 地城來解鎖更高等級的地城。

description.eng: Quick and instant gang hideout raid with cost of ${item} or ${item2}
description.trans: 快速即時幫派據點突襲，消耗${item}或${item2}

description.eng: Quick and instant gang hideout raid with cost of ${item} or ${item2}
description.trans: 快速即時幫派巢穴突襲，花費${item}或${item2}

description.eng: How many do you want to discard?
description.trans: 你想要丟棄幾個？

addItemStackFull.eng: Can't add anymore ${name} to inventory because it reached stack limit
addItemStackFull.trans: 無法將更多的${name}添加到倉庫中，因為已達到堆疊限制

inDungeon.eng: You cannot move items while in a dungeon.
inDungeon.trans: 在地城中無法移動物品。

description.eng: Are you sure you want to discard these items?\nThey will be destroyed permanently.
description.trans: 你確定要丟棄這些物品嗎？\n它們將會被永久摧毀。

message.eng: Are you sure you want to abandon this case? All collected clues will be lost and you'll need to start over with a new case.
message.trans: 你確定要放棄此案嗎？已收集的所有線索都將遺失，並且你需要重新開始一個新案件。

abandonFailed.eng: Failed to abandon investigation. Please try again.

abandoned.eng: Investigation abandoned. You can start a new case anytime.
abandoned.trans: 調查已中止。您隨時可開啟新的案件。

caseResolved.trans: 幻光市警局案件已解決

contradictoryElements.eng: Multiple contradictory elements detected in the proposed verdict.
contradictoryElements.trans: 偵測到建議的判決中包含多個矛盾要素。

correctVerdict.eng: Your deduction was correct. The truth has been uncovered.
correctVerdict.trans: 你的推斷正確。真相已被揭露。

evidenceAcquired.trans: 證據已登錄 - 幻光市警局資料庫

evidenceMismatch.eng: The submitted conclusion does not align with available evidence patterns.
evidenceMismatch.trans: 提交的結論與現有證據模式不符。

investigationAbandoned.eng: Investigation abandoned. You can start a new case anytime.

investigationClosed.eng: Investigation terminated. Case file closed. Evidence confiscated.
investigationClosed.trans: 調查結束。案卷已封存。證據已扣押。

moreCluesNeeded.eng: Continue exploring to find more clues...

short.trans: 在地牢中尋找更多線索

intelBody1.eng: This console activates automatically once you capture your first clue.
intelBody1.trans: 一旦你取得第一條線索，該控制台將自動啟動。

intelBody2.eng: Track the entire case from here—clues, summaries, and final verdict submission.
intelBody2.trans: 從此追蹤整個案件—線索、摘要與最終裁決提交

statusInline.eng: Case Slot Open • Permit required to submit verdict
statusInline.trans: 案件槽位已開啟 • 提交裁決需持有許可證

desc.eng: Stronghold investigation points feed clues directly into this console.
desc.trans: 堡壘調查點將線索直接送進此控制台。

desc.eng: Collect all four clues to unlock the verdict authorization rail.
desc.trans: 收集全部四個線索以解鎖判決授權軌道。

desc.eng: Spend one Investigation Access Permit to commit your conclusion.
desc.trans: 花費一張調查通行證提交結論。

tipBody.eng: Tap to open the Investigation field manual and review how cases operate.
tipBody.trans: 點擊以開啟調查手冊並查看案件運作方式。

noActiveInvestigation.eng: You have no active investigation to abandon.
noActiveInvestigation.trans: 目前沒有可放棄的調查。

noPermit.trans: 提交裁決需要調查通行證。這些可在地牢寶箱中找到。

notAllCluesCollected.eng: You must collect all clues before solving the case.
notAllCluesCollected.trans: 必須先搜集所有線索，才能解決案件。

readyToSolve.eng: You have all the evidence. Review your findings and solve the case.

description.eng: Review completed cases and revisit final reports.

submitError.eng: Failed to submit verdict. Please try again.

biography.eng: Numbers form the hidden language of our world – from the pulse of the Arclight exchange to the illicit NetCoin trails funding Black Market chrome. I am Anya Petrova, and I translate that language. My analysis cuts through the noise, revealing the systemic forces, like TaiXing's market plays, shaping Arclight City.
biography.trans: 數字構成隱藏世界的語言，從幻光交易所的脈動，到資助黑市改造的非法網幣蹤跡。我是安雅·彼得羅娃，我翻譯這種語言。我的分析能穿透雜訊，揭示塑造幻光之城的系統性力量，例如台芯的市場操作。

biography.eng: They called me reckless dodging corpo security in the Industrial Zone. They called me obsessed documenting the leaks from BioSyn Labs Sector 7. Call me what you want, but I find the truth, even if it costs eddies or gets me on an ACPD watchlist. My name is Jack Jackson, and I bring the stories others bury.
biography.trans: 他們說我不要命，在工業區狂躲企業狗。他們說我著了魔，死命追著BioSyn Labs 7區的料。隨便你們怎麼叫，真相我是一定要挖出來的，就算噴錢、上了ACPD黑名單也無所謂。我叫傑克·傑克森，我挖出別人蓋起來的料。

biography.eng: Down here in the neon haze of the Lower Districts, stories unfold on street corners and in the back rooms of ripperdocs. I'm Kai Tanaka. I walk these streets, talk to the chromed-out chooms, the wired, the discarded, and bring their voices to the surface. This is life at the edge of the chrome.
biography.trans: 在下城區霓虹燈的迷霧中，故事在街角和義體醫生的後巷裡展開。我是田中凱。我走在這些街道上，和那些裝了義肢的夥計、改造人、被拋棄的人們交談，並將他們的心聲帶到檯面上。這就是活在邊緣的賽博生活。

biography.eng: Conflict isn't just fought on battlefields; it's waged in boardrooms, data streams, and the shadow networks tangled in the PAC-FSA cold war. I am Zara Khan. With a background dissecting global threats, I provide clear-eyed analysis of the forces, from Arclight's corpo council to offshore powers, vying for control.
biography.trans: 衝突不只發生在戰場；它也蔓延到董事會、數據流，以及糾結在太平洋-自由貿易協定冷戰中的影子網絡。我是莎拉·罕。我專精於分析全球威脅，提供清晰的分析，揭示從幻光之城的企業理事會到境外勢力，爭奪控制權的各方勢力。

description.trans: 離線時賺取獎勵

detailed.eng: Set up automated activities and background tasks that generate resources, experience, and rewards even when you're away from the game.
detailed.trans: 設定自動化活動與背景任務，即使離線也能產生資源、經驗與獎勵。

description.eng: Earn exclusive seasonal rewards
description.trans: 獲得專屬季節獎勵

detailed.eng: Progress through free and premium seasonal tracks with missions, milestone rewards, and exclusive cosmetics. Complete challenges to unlock tier-based prizes.
detailed.trans: 在免費與付費季節路線中完成任務、收集里程碑獎勵及專屬外觀。完成挑戰以解鎖分級獎品。

description.eng: Trade with other players
description.trans: 與其他玩家交易

detailed.eng: Buy and sell items through the player-driven auction house. List your gear, place bids on others' items, and find great deals from fellow players.
detailed.trans: 在玩家主導的拍賣行中買賣物品。上架裝備、投標他人商品，並從其他玩家處尋找超值交易。

description.eng: Place or collect bounties
description.trans: 設定或領取賞金

detailed.eng: Place bounties on rival players or hunt down wanted targets for rewards. Track and eliminate high-value targets to collect lucrative bounties.
detailed.trans: 對競爭者掛賞金或狩獵通緝目標以換取報酬。追蹤並消滅高價值目標，收集豐厚賞金。

highlight.trans: 成為城中最令人畏懼的人

description.eng: Cook food for powerful buffs
description.trans: 烹飪食物，獲得強力增益

detailed.eng: Gather ingredients from dungeons and various tasks, then cook them in your apartment's kitchen. Prepared meals grant powerful temporary buffs to enhance your performance.
detailed.trans: 從地下城及各種任務收集食材，並在公寓廚房烹飪。料理可賦予強力暫時增益，提升你的表現。

description.eng: Complete tasks for rewards
description.trans: 完成任務以換取獎勵

detailed.eng: Take on daily quests and weekly intelligence contracts with escalating rewards and bonuses. Earn free daily rewards by login in everyday.
detailed.trans: 挑戰每日任務與每週情報合約，隨進度提升獎勵與加成。每天登入即可免費領取每日獎勵。

description.eng: Explore dungeons with your friends for loot
description.trans: 和好友一起探索地牢，獲取戰利品

detailed.eng: Tackle challenging instanced dungeons with your squad or alone. Defeat powerful bosses, and claim legendary equipment and resources.
detailed.trans: 與隊伍或單獨挑戰高難度的分離副本。擊敗強力首領，並取得傳奇裝備和資源。

description.eng: Chat with players worldwide
description.trans: 與全球玩家聊天

detailed.eng: Join chat with real-time auto-translation across all supported languages, players worldwide meets in Arclight City
detailed.trans: 加入即時多語言自動翻譯聊天室，全球玩家齊聚幻光之城

highlight.eng: SPEAK ANY LANGUAGE, UNDERSTOOD BY ALL

description.eng: Recruit and upgrade mercenaries to join your crew
description.trans: 招募並升級傭兵，讓他們加入你的隊伍

detailed.eng: Build your squad with diverse mercenaries, each with unique stats, buffs and skills. Upgrade them and build your perfect crew.
detailed.trans: 用多元化的傭兵組建你的隊伍，每位都有獨特屬性、增益與技能。升級他們，打造完美隊伍。

overline.trans: 遊戲特色 // 核心系統

description.eng: Trade stocks of mega corporations
description.trans: 交易大型企業股票

detailed.eng: Invest in a realistic and unpredictable stock market reflecting real-world events and news. Buy and sell stocks of in-game mega corporations to make a profit.
detailed.trans: 投資於真實且難以預測、能反映現實事件與新聞的股市。購買並出售遊戲內大型企業股票，賺取利潤。

description.eng: Own and customize your apartment
description.trans: 擁有並客製化你的公寓

detailed.eng: Claim your own apartment in the city complete with a personal vault and kitchen for cooking. Host visitors and create your personal cyberpunk sanctuary.
detailed.trans: 在城市中擁有一間配備個人保險箱與廚房的公寓，招待客人並打造你的賽博朋克庇護所。

description.eng: Mug players or play as cops
description.trans: 搶劫玩家或扮演警察

detailed.eng: Mug other players for their valuables or take on the role of law enforcement to arrest wanted criminals and maintain order in the city.
detailed.trans: 搶奪其他玩家的貴重物品，或擔任警員逮捕通緝犯並維持市區秩序。

description.eng: Capture districts and earn bonuses
description.trans: 佔領區域，獲得獎勵

detailed.eng: Compete for district control, wage gang wars, and unlock exclusive bonuses in your territory.
detailed.trans: 競逐區域控制權，展開幫派戰爭，並在你的領土中解鎖專屬獎勵。

description.eng: Daily in-game news reports
description.trans: 每日遊戲內新聞報導

detailed.eng: Stay informed with dynamically updated news reports that gets affected by all player activities, major events, and emerging stories in the cyberpunk world. Maybe your demise will be the next headline?
detailed.trans: 隨時掌握即時更新的新聞報導，內容因玩家行動、重大事件及新興故事而變化。也許你的覆滅將成為下一條頭條？

subline.eng: Arclight City is a vibrant city where you can explore, fight, and trade in a cyberpunk world.
subline.trans: 幻光之城是一座熱鬧繁華的都市，你可在此探索、戰鬥與交易，體驗賽博朋克世界。

copy.eng: Buy and sell corporate shares, monitor player-listed gear, and react to Flash Sales without leaving the dashboard.
copy.trans: 在儀表板內買賣公司股份、監控玩家上架裝備，並即時回應閃購，無需離開。

headline.eng: Track the Mega Corporations in real time

overline.eng: Realtime Stock Exchange // 24/7 Live in-game Stock Market
overline.trans: 即時股市 // 24/7 遊戲內實況市場

tag1.eng: Price action reacts to real-world events and news
tag1.trans: 價格走勢受實際事件和新聞影響

tag2.eng: Buy and sell stocks of in-game mega corporations
tag2.trans: 買賣遊戲內大型企業股票

tag3.eng: Fair and unpredictable market derived on real-world data
tag3.trans: 基於真實世界資料的公平且難以預測市場

promotional.trans: 重型火力結合電驅狂怒

whisper.eng: When stealth fails, bring the chrome. When chrome fails... you were already dead
whisper.trans: 潛行失敗時，裝備 Chrome；若 Chrome 也失敗…你已經沒命了。

copy.eng: Unlock NPC mercenaries with unique roles, level them up, and build your perfect crew for gigs and raids.
copy.trans: 解鎖擁有獨特職能的 NPC 傭兵，升級他們並為任務與突襲組建完美隊伍。

promotional.trans: 近戰血腥屠戮，保證成效

whisper.eng: They say violence isn't the answer. They've never met my chainsaw
whisper.trans: 有人說暴力不是答案。他們從未見過我的鏈鋸

promotional.trans: 沉默行動需要沉默夥伴。

whisper.eng: The shadows have eyes... and they're watching for you
whisper.trans: 影子有眼睛…他們正在盯著你。

promotional.eng: Precision firepower when it matters most

whisper.eng: Distance is just a number. Death is a certainty. Get yourself a sniper
whisper.trans: 距離只是個數字，死亡是必然。快去拿支狙擊槍吧。

heading.eng: Recruit specialists to support your squad
heading.trans: 招募專家，支援你的隊伍

promotional.trans: 確保你的隊伍全天候備戰

whisper.eng: A crew that bleeds together... needs someone who can put them back together
whisper.trans: 同袍共患難的團隊，需要有人把他們重新組合。

tag1.eng: Upgrade mercenaries to increase their stats
tag1.trans: 升級傭兵以提升其屬性

tag2.eng: Unique abilities to synergize with your crew
tag2.trans: 與隊伍協同的獨特技能

copy.eng: Every gang war, bounty kill, and major deal triggers real news reports. Upgrade your gear? Launch a territory raid? YOU could be on tomorrow's front page.
copy.trans: 每場幫派戰、賞金殺手與重大交易都會引起真實新聞報導。升級裝備？發動領地攻擊？你可能登上明日頭版！

heading.trans: 你的每個舉動都能登上頭條

noNews.eng: No news available at the moment

overline.trans: 即時世界事件 // 玩家主導的敘事

description.eng: Face critical decisions during dungeon encounters. Risk it all for rewards, play it safe, or flee—every choice has consequences.
description.trans: 面對地下城遭遇時的關鍵決策。全力冒險以求獎勵、謹慎行事或逃離——每個選擇都有後果。

copy.eng: Real in-game screenshots showcasing tactical combat, deep lore, and endless progression
copy.trans: 真實遊戲畫面：戰術對決、深厚世界觀與無盡進程

description.eng: Form parties, assign roles, and launch procedural dungeons with unique loot tables and boss encounters.
description.trans: 組隊、分配角色，並啟動帶有獨特掉落表與首領遭遇的隨機生成地牢。

heading.eng: See What Awaits You in the Neon Wasteland
heading.trans: 探索霓虹廢土，發現等待你的驚喜

description.eng: Unlock narrative fragments and codex bonuses as you explore the cyberpunk world and complete missions.
description.trans: 探索賽博朋克世界、完成任務，解鎖敘事碎片與編年誌獎勵。

title.eng: Discover world lore and collectible entries
title.trans: 探索世界傳說與收藏品

description.eng: Multiple minigames to unlock chests in dungeons
description.trans: 多場迷你遊戲解鎖地下城寶箱

description.eng: Strategic combat with hit/miss/crit mechanics, damage mitigation, build your perfect crew and loadout.
description.trans: 策略戰鬥：命中/失敗/暴擊、傷害減免，打造理想隊伍與裝備。

copy.eng: Verified players from around the world share their experiences with Arclight City
copy.trans: 來自全球的已驗證玩家分享他們在幻光之城的體驗

overline.trans: Google Play × Apple App Store // 信任指標

quote.eng: I was really surprised. The graphics fit the atmosphere very well. It's a simple click-and-click game, but it packs a punch. And there's no advertising, which isn't normal these days. So, 5 🌟
quote.trans: 我真的很驚訝。畫面與氛圍相得益彰，雖然是簡單的點擊遊戲，但卻打得很過癮，而且沒有廣告，現在這種情況不常見。所以給5 🌟

quote.eng: A game in my favorite setting, even with customizable skins! It's fantastic. I like it. The donations aren't pushy. It's nice. There are even free gifts. Very nice. You can feel the love for the setting. I like this kind of thing :3
quote.trans: 這款遊戲符合我的最愛設定，甚至可以自訂皮膚！超讚，我很喜歡。捐贈方式不會太強迫，感覺很好。有免費禮物，真是太棒了。能體驗到對設定的熱情。我就喜歡這種風格。

quote.eng: I recently started playing it, and I must say it completely captivated me. Everything is very well thought out, and so far I haven't found any bugs. I plan to dedicate many hours to this gem.
quote.trans: 我最近開始玩這款遊戲，說實話它完全吸引了我。所有細節都設計得很周全，到目前為止，我還沒發現任何錯誤。我打算投入大量時間來享受這顆寶石。

quote.eng: One of the truly good games on the store. A great atmosphere and a wide range of gameplay depth make it a great way to pass the time. It's also entirely in German. Keep it up!
quote.trans: 商店裡最優質的遊戲之一，擁有極佳氛圍與多樣化玩法深度，是打發時間的不二選擇。整個遊戲全程使用德語，請繼續保持！

quote.eng: I am enjoying this game with a great retro feel. It truly holds up to "retro text-based graphics with captivating modern pixel art, delivering a truly unique visual experience". Take your neuroblockers choom! I will see you in the strongholds.
quote.trans: 我正沉浸在這款極具復古風情的遊戲中。它真實地堪稱「復古文字式圖形配合迷人現代像素藝術，帶來獨一無二的視覺體驗」。把你的神經阻斷劑拿起來，夥計！我們在堡壘見面吧。

quote.eng: I invested all my money in stocks and now I'm fighting homeless people over synthetic bread. And everything's great in the game 👍
quote.trans: 我把所有錢投進股市，現在卻跟無家可歸的人為了人造麵包打架。遊戲裡一切都很順利。

quote.eng: This game is amazing for cyberpunk lovers.I highly recommend it.
quote.trans: 這款遊戲對賽博朋克迷而言絕佳，強烈推薦。

quote.eng: it's pretty fun it's my pocket cyberpunk
quote.trans: 相當好玩，這是我的口袋賽博朋克

1.eng: Seems like some of your equipments are still at level ${level} or lower. upgrade their level with ${levelUpItem} in item upgrade page
1.trans: 看起來你的一些裝備仍然處於${level}等級或更低。在物品升級頁面使用${levelUpItem}來提升它們的等級吧。

currentEffectDescription.eng: Increases strength by ${strength} (increases melee weapons damage by ${dmg}) and bodyguard task profit to ${profit}
currentEffectDescription.trans: 增加力量 ${strength} (增加近戰武器傷害 ${dmg}) 和保鏢任務收益至 ${profit}

description.eng: Increases strength attribute by 1 every level, and increases profit from this job type
description.trans: 每級增加1點力量屬性，並增加此工作類型的收益

currentEffectDescription.eng: Increases intelligence by ${intelligence} (increases energy weapon damage by ${healing}) and Extraction Mission task profit to ${profit}
currentEffectDescription.trans: 智力增加${intelligence} (能量武器傷害增加${healing})，並提高救援任務的收益至${profit}

description.eng: Increases intelligence attribute by 1 every level, and increases profit from this job type
description.trans: 每級增加1點智力屬性，並增加此工作類型的收益

description.eng: quest affinity level increases reward quality by a small amount
description.trans: 任務親和度提升，獎勵品質會稍微提升。

currentEffectDescription.eng: Increases vitality by ${vitality} (increases health by ${health}) and scavenging task profit to ${profit}
currentEffectDescription.trans: 增加活力 ${vitality} (增加生命 ${health}) 和搜索任務的收益至 ${profit}

description.eng: Increases vitality attribute by 1 every level, and increases profit from this job type
description.trans: 每級增加1點活力屬性，並增加這種工作類型的收益

currentEffectDescription.eng: Increases dexterity by ${dexterity} (increases fire-arm weapons damage by ${dmg}) and thieving task profit to ${profit}
currentEffectDescription.trans: 提高敏捷${dexterity}（增加火器武器傷害${dmg}）和偷竊任務收益至 ${profit}

description.eng: Increases dexterity attribute by 1 every level, and increases profit from this job type
description.trans: 每級增加1點敏捷屬性，並增加此工作類型的收益

description.eng: Make your guest account permanent to prevent accidental loss of progress.
description.trans: 將您的訪客帳號轉為永久帳號，以防止意外丟失進度。

description1.eng: You can use an fake email if you have privacy concerns
description1.trans: 如果你有隱私顧慮，可以使用假電子郵件。

descriptionPopover.eng: but you will not be able to receive reset password emails, so please remember your email and password.
descriptionPopover.trans: 但您將無法收到重設密碼的電子郵件，因此請記住您的電子郵件和密碼。

title.eng: More levels will be unlocked when level up
title.trans: 升等後將解鎖更多關卡

lockedError.eng: You can travel to this location when you reach level ${level}, or by completing the previous level stronghold.
lockedError.trans: 當您達到等級${level}或完成前一關的地城時，您可以前往這個地點。

pageDescription.eng: Explore the dark streets of Arclight City, a cyberpunk text-based MMORPG. Dive into a world of corporate intrigue, mercenaries, and cybernetic enhancements.
pageDescription.trans: 探索幻光之城的黑暗街道，這是一款以文字為基礎的電驅朋克MMORPG。潛入一個充滿企業陰謀、雇傭兵和電驅增強的世界。

pageTitle.trans: 幻光之城 - 賽博朋克文字型MMORPG

resetEmailSent.trans: 重設郵件已發送。請檢查您的電子郵件。

serverUnavailable.trans: 伺服器維護中，我們會盡快恢復服務。

pachinkoTip.trans: 每一輪彈珠台你將會從獎勵清單中獲得其中一個獎勵。

blockPlayerConfirm.trans: 請選擇與此玩家的後續動作：

body1.trans: 嗨，幻光之城的賽博朋克們！

body2.eng: Currently, Arclight City is undergoing maintenance to address a few unexpected issues. This is crucial for ensuring a top-notch gaming experience.
body2.trans: 目前，幻光之城正在進行維護以解決一系統問題。這對於確保一流的遊戲體驗至關重要。

body4.eng: This maintenance is scheduled to finish in a few minutes, but I will keep you updated if that changes.
body4.trans: 這次的維護預計在幾分鐘內完成，但如果有變動，我會隨時通知你。

body5.eng: The goal is to ensure that every aspect of Arclight City functions smoothly for your adventures.
body5.trans: 我們的目標是確保幻光之城的每個方面都能順利運作，讓你的冒險更加順利。

body6.eng: I'm working diligently to address a few unexpected issues that have arisen.
body6.trans: 我正在努力處理一些意外出現的問題。

body7.eng: I understand the disruption this may cause change to your gaming plans and sincerely apologize for any inconvenience. Your experience in Arclight City is incredibly important to me, and I'm committed to completing this maintenance as quickly as possible
body7.trans: 我了解這可能會對你的遊戲計劃造成的干擾，並為任何不便深表歉意。你在幻光之城的遊戲體驗對我來說非常重要，我致力於盡快完成此次維護。

body8.eng: Thank you for your patience and understanding. Your support and enthusiasm for Arclight City are what drive these efforts.
body8.trans: 感謝您的耐心和理解。您對幻光之城的支持和熱情是推動這些努力的動力。

bidPlacedGrace.eng: A player has placed a ${amount} bid on ${item}. The auction has been extended by ${minutes} minutes.

buyout.trans: ${item}已被買斷，${amount}（${originalAmount} - ${tax}% 稅）已加入您的帳戶。

buyoutSuccess.trans: 您已成功以${amount}的價格使用一次性購買方式購買了${item}。

bidLowerThanCurrentBid.trans: 您不能出比目前競標價格更低的價格。

buyoutTooLow.trans: 買斷價格太低，最低買斷價格為${minBid}。

itemNotFound.trans: 此物品已不存在您的市場

minBidTooLow.eng: Minimum bid is too low, minimum bid is ${minBid}
minBidTooLow.trans: 最低出價太低，最低出價為${minBid}

itemExpired.eng: Your item ${item} has expired on market with no bidder, and has been returned to your delivery interface
itemExpired.trans: 您的物品${item}在市場上已到期且無人競標，已退回到您的交付介面。

bidderMsg.eng: You have won the bid for ${item}. the item has been sent to your item delivery interface
bidderMsg.trans: 您已贏得${item}的競標，該物品已傳送到您的物品交付介面。

ownerMsg.eng: ${item} has been sold on market to the highest bidder for ${price}, you received ${afterTax} (${price} - ${tax}% tax)
ownerMsg.trans: ${item}已賣給最高競標者，您收到了${afterTax}（${price} - ${tax}% 稅）

cantRemoveBid.eng: This item has a bid and can\'t be removed
cantRemoveBid.trans: 此物品有人競標，無法移除

cantRemoveTime.eng: This item has been on market for more than ${time} minutes and can\'t be removed
cantRemoveTime.trans: 此物品已在市場上超過${time}分鐘，無法移除

alreadyBid.eng: You have already placed a bid on this item
alreadyBid.trans: 您已經競標過這個物品了。

ownItem.eng: You cannot bid on your own item
ownItem.trans: 您無法競標自己的商品。

notEnoughCurrency.eng: You do not have enough currency to place this bid
notEnoughCurrency.trans: 您的貨幣不足以進行此競標

tip.eng: Each equipment can only be traded on the market ${amount} time, after that it will become not tradable.
tip.trans: 每件裝備只能在市場上交易${amount}次，之後將無法交易。

title.eng: Average price for ${amount} ${itemType} on market is ${total}
title.trans: 市場上${amount}個${itemType}的平均價格為${total}

noItemSelected.eng: Please select an item to put on the market

noPrice.eng: Please set minimum bid or buyout price
noPrice.trans: 請設定最低競標或買斷價格

description.eng: Please select an item to put on the market
description.trans: 請選擇一件物品放到市場上。

tip.eng: Items you list in the market will initially have a withdrawal period of ${minute} minutes, during which no one can place a bid. After this withdrawal period ends, the system will require a minimum bid difference of at least ${minBidDiff} compared to the previous highest bid.
tip.trans: 您在市場上列出的物品將有一個初始的撤銷期，為${minute}分鐘，期間內無法競標。撤銷期結束後，系統將參考之前的最高競價，設定最低差額至少為${minBidDiff}。

itemLocked.eng: This item is locked, please unlock it before putting it on the market
itemLocked.trans: 這件物品被加密，請在上架前解鎖

title.eng: Select item to put on market

firstDraw.eng: You have to draw 10 mercenaries first

notEnoughSpace.eng: You have too many mercenaries now, you may upgrade the space by getting a better apartment.
notEnoughSpace.trans: 您現在的傭兵太多了，您可以透過租一間更好的公寓來增加空間。

upgradeLevelError.eng: Level up to increase your mercenary's max level
upgradeLevelError.trans: 升等以提高傭兵的最高等級

deleteMercenary.eng: Are you sure you want to dismiss this mercenary?
deleteMercenary.trans: 您確定要解僱這名傭兵嗎？

deleteMercenaryMessage2.eng: You will irreversibly lose all progress on this mercenary but a portion of resources spend will be returned.
deleteMercenaryMessage2.trans: 您將永久失去此傭兵的所有進度，但部分已花費的資源將會退還。

description.eng: Are you sure you want to dismiss the selected mercenaries?
description.trans: 您確定要解僱所選的傭兵嗎？

description.eng: Dismissed mercenaries will be lost forever. However, you will receive a portion of the spent resources based on rarity.
description.trans: 解僱的傭兵將永遠失去。不過您將根據稀有度獲得一部分已使用的資源。

recruitMaxError.eng: You cannot recruit more than ${max} mercenaries, you can increase the max mercenary by renting a better apartment. or you may dismiss your unwanted mercenary for resources.
recruitMaxError.trans: 您無法招募超過${max}名傭兵，您可以透過租用更好的公寓來增加最大傭兵數量。或者您可以為了資源解僱您不想要的傭兵。

recruitTenDescription.eng: one 4 star or higher mercenary is guaranteed
recruitTenDescription.trans: 保證至少一名四星或更高星級的傭兵

description.eng: Contact capacity: ${current} / ${max}
description.trans: 聯絡人容量：${current} / ${max}

noMercenaries.eng: You do not have any mercenaries in your contact
noMercenaries.trans: 您的聯絡人中沒有傭兵。

default.eng: Dismiss mercenaries to receive ${enhancer} and ${upgrade} base on their level and stars.
default.trans: 解僱傭兵以依據他們的等級和星等獲得${enhancer}和${upgrade}。

noLevelUp.eng: Level up your mercenaries to improve their stats and ability
noLevelUp.trans: 提升您的傭兵等級，以改善他們的屬性和能力

noMercenaries.eng: You can recruit mercenaries from the Red Bar.
noMercenaries.trans: 您可以從霓虹酒吧招募傭兵。

description.eng: A bounty hunter is a mercenary who uses their skills to hunt down their enemies
description.trans: 賞金獵人是能使用其技能追踪敵人的傭兵。

description.eng: A netrunner is a hacker who uses their skills to infiltrate computer systems
description.trans: 網路行者是一名利用其技能滲透電腦系統的駭客。

description.eng: A protector is a mercenary who uses their skills to protect their allies
description.trans: 守護者是一名傭兵，利用他們的技能保護他們的盟友。

description.eng: Invite ${player} to your gang
description.trans: 邀請${player}加入您的幫派

selfClickError.eng: This button is for others to click to invite you, to accept invites please click on accept button in notification center (bell icon in top right corner of main screen
selfClickError.trans: 這個按鈕是讓其他人點擊來邀請你，要接受邀請請點擊通知中心（主畫面右上角的鈴鐺圖示）的接受按鈕。

instruction.eng: Click when the pulse aligns with the connection point
instruction.trans: 當脈衝與連接點對齊時點擊

instructions.eng: Identify and execute all obfuscated code to breach the system firewall.
instructions.trans: 識別並執行所有混淆代碼以突破系統防火牆。
按照順序點擊連接節點

howToPlay.eng: Click each dial to rotate it and match the target position
howToPlay.trans: 依序點選各旋鈕調整至目標位置

instructions.eng: CLICK DIALS TO ROTATE AND MATCH TARGET POSITIONS
instructions.trans: 按下旋鈕旋轉並對準目標位置

instruction.eng: Recreate the sequence. Any mistake will reset with a new pattern.
instruction.trans: 重新創建序列。任何錯誤將會重置為新模式。

instructions.eng: Keep the signal in the green zone to synchronize. Tap the UP arrow to move the signal up, and the DOWN arrow to move it down.
instructions.trans: 將訊號保持在綠色區域以進行同步。點擊向上箭頭將訊號向上移動，點擊向下箭頭將其向下移動。

instructions.eng: Hold to raise pressure • Release to lower • Maintain ${duration}s in zone
instructions.trans: 長按提升壓力 • 鬆開降低壓力 • 在區域內維持${duration}秒

description.eng: Tap the target to acquire it
description.trans: 點擊目標以獲取它

status.eng: Tap the decrypted keywords to unlock the terminal
status.trans: 點擊已解密的關鍵字以解鎖終端機

progress.trans: 安全節點已被繞過。還剩${remaining}。

success.trans: 訪問已授權。終端已解鎖。

tip.eng: Click on the highlighted button to unlock
Activate all dots to unlock by clicking. The dots will rotate faster and faster.
tip.trans: 點擊以激活所有點以解鎖。點會旋轉得越來越快。

mercExpCurrencyDescription.eng: A nano-machine injection device created by TaiXing Cybernetics, providing unparalleled upgrades to cybernetic abilities. Inject into the neck for enhanced performance.
mercExpCurrencyDescription.trans: 由台芯電馭製造的奈米機器注射裝置，為電馭能力提供無與倫比的升級。注射到頸部以提高性能

aierror.trans: 您的座右銘含有不適當的詞彙

noticeFailed.eng: Notice failed to post due to moderation
noticeFailed.trans: 通知因審核失敗而未能發佈

serviceDown.eng: Motto editing is temporally disabled due to external service downtime, please try again later
serviceDown.trans: 因外部服務暫時停止，座右銘編輯功能暫時無法使用，請稍後再試。

contact.eng: If you have any questions, please contact us at ${email}
contact.trans: 若您有任何問題，請透過 ${email} 聯絡我們

description.eng: Your account has been muted by the SYSTEM. You are temporarily unable to send messages or mails.
description.trans: 您的帳號已被系統禁言，暫時無法發送訊息或郵件。

slogan.eng: YOUR TRUSTED SOURCE FOR ARCLIGHT CITY NEWS AND EVENTS
slogan.trans: 幻光之城情報站，給你最靠譜的新聞與活動！

gangMention.eng: The Arclight Times has mentioned your gang in a news article
gangMention.trans: 幻光時報新聞有提到你的幫派喔！

newReportAvailable.eng: The Arclight Chronicle has published today's news report!
newReportAvailable.trans: 幻光紀事報已發佈今天的新聞報導！

newsReportGenerated.eng: Arclight Times posted a new news report
newsReportGenerated.trans: 幻光時報推送了新報導。

playerMention.eng: The Arclight Times has mentioned you in a news article
playerMention.trans: 幻光時報報導提到你了啦！

alreadyInvitedError.eng: You have already invited this player
alreadyInvitedError.trans: 您已經邀請過這位玩家了

body.eng: ${inviter} have invited you to their apartment

message.eng: ${playerName} has invited you to their apartment.

alreadyInvitedError.eng: You have already invited this player
alreadyInvitedError.trans: 您已經邀請過這個玩家了。

body.eng: ${inviter} have invited you to their gang ${clanName}
body.trans: ${inviter} 邀請你加入他們的幫派 ${clanName}

message.eng: ${playerName} has invited you to their gang ${clanName}.

alreadyInvitedError.eng: You have already invited this player
alreadyInvitedError.trans: 您已經邀請過這位玩家了。

body.eng: ${inviter} have invited you to their stronghold lobby
body.trans: ${inviter} 邀請你加入他們的地城大廳

message.eng: ${playerName} has invited you to their stronghold lobby.
message.trans: ${playerName}邀請您加入他們的地城大廳。

alreadyInClan.eng: You are already in a gang
alreadyInClan.trans: 您已經加入一個幫派了

description.eng: Popular bar amounts mercenaries, you can find Chloe here and meet other mercenaries
description.trans: 聚集了許多傭兵的熱門酒吧，您可以在這裡找到Chloe並認識其他傭兵。

eng: What can I get for you?
Make it quick, I don't have all day.
You're not from around here, are you?
I don't do small talk, what do you want to drink?
You're not the chatty type, I like that. What can I get you?
trans: 我能為您做什麼？
快點，我沒有一整天可以耗。
您不是本地人，對吧？
我不喜歡閒聊，您想喝什麼？
您不是那種愛說話的人，我喜歡。您想要點什麼？

pachinkoGuy.eng: Talk to pachinko guy in the corner
pachinkoGuy.trans: 找角落的柏青哥愛好者聊天

eng: Come back later, I have nothing for you right now.
Afraid I'm fresh out of gigs, hon. Come back another time.
Sorry, darling. The quest shelf is empty at the moment. Swing by later.
trans: 稍後再來，我現在沒有任何任務給您。
很抱歉，我現在沒有任何任務，親愛的。請另選時間再來。
抱歉，親愛的。目前任務架上是空的。稍後再來看看吧。

eng: Up for new gigs?
trans: 準備好接收新的工作了嗎？

eng: Let me know when you have completed the objectives :)
trans: 當任務完成後請通知我 :)

lowLevel.eng: You need to be at least level ${level} to put item to the market
lowLevel.trans: 您需要達到至少${level}等才能將物品放到市場上

noApartment.eng: You need an apartment to use the market
noApartment.trans: 您需要一間公寓才能使用市場

description.eng: A discreet trading post for mercs of ArcLight City, you can sell and buy items here with Ren.
description.trans: 一個為幻光之城傭兵打造的低調貿易站，您可以跟仁交易物品。

eng: Welcome to the underbelly of this city. Hope you've got something worth trading.
Auction night is always full of surprises. Are you ready to bid on your fate?
They say in the black market, you can buy anything, even your own salvation. What's your salvation worth to you?
trans: 歡迎來到這個城市的黑暗面。希望你有值得交易的東西。
拍賣之夜總是充滿驚喜。你準備好競標你的命運了嗎？
他們說在黑市上，你可以買到任何東西，甚至是自己的救贖。你的救贖對你來說值多少錢？

myStuffButton.eng: show me my stuff on the market
myStuffButton.trans: 顯示我在市場上的物品

eng: Not at the moment, chromehead. But don't sweat it. I'll hit you up when I've got a job that suits your skill set.
Nada right now, but don't go rebootin' just yet. I'll drop a line when I've got somethin' spicy to offer. Patience, choomba.
No gigs on tap, sweetheart. But stay frosty, 'cause I'll give you a holla when a sweet opportunity slides my way.
trans: 暫時沒有工作，老哥。但別擔心。等我找到適合您技能的工作時，我會聯絡您的。
現在沒料，但還不要重新啟動。等我有什麼好東西時，我會通知您。耐心點，夥計。
甜心，目前沒有任何任務。但保持警覺，因為當有一個好機會出現時，我會通知您。

eng: Up for new gigs?
trans: 有新任務嗎？

eng: Quit wasting my time, unless you have done your job.
trans: 除非您已經完成您的工作，否則不要浪費我的時間。

tipBox.eng: You can sell your items here to other players, or buy items from other players.
tipBox.trans: 您可以在這裡將物品賣給其他玩家，或是向其他玩家購買物品。

eng: 呵呵呵…這就是他們的期望。我更喜歡直接切入主題。
你在好人榜上嗎？最好確定，否則事態將變得複雜。
聖誕節氛圍必須到位，遵守不容協商。
禮物交換是一項戰術行動。你準備好了嗎？
又有客戶。好，我的配額不會自己補滿。
trans: 呵呵呵…這就是他們的期望。我更喜歡直接切入主題。
你在好人榜上嗎？最好確定，否則事態將變得複雜。
聖誕節氛圍必須到位，遵守不容協商。
禮物交換是一項戰術行動。你準備好了嗎？
又有客戶。好，我的配額不會自己補滿。

locationDesc.eng: A militarized gift distribution center run by Noel, where Christmas cheer is a tactical operation.
locationDesc.trans: 由 Noel 管理的軍事化禮物配送中心，聖誕歡樂被視為戰術行動。

description.eng: If you are injured, you can visit Oriana to fix you up, with a price of course.
description.trans: 如果您受傷了，您可以拜訪奧莉安娜治療您的傷口，當然不是免費的。

eng: Upgrade some chromes today choom?
trans: 今天要升級一下裝備嗎，夥計？

eng: No gigs for you, rookie. But don't wander too far. I've got a knack for stumbling upon trouble, and I'll make sure you're front and center when the time comes.
No jobs at the moment, but don't go rebootin' just yet. I'll drop a line when I've got somethin' spicy to offer. Patience, choomba.
Looking for a fix, huh? Sorry, no new quests on my operating table. But I'll keep your name on file for when I've got a job that needs some... delicate extraction.
trans: 菜鳥，沒有任務給您。但別走得太遠。我很擅長碰上麻煩，到時候我會確保您也參一咖。
現在沒料，但還不要重新啟動。等我有什麼好東西時，我會通知您。耐心點，夥計。
找解決方法，是嗎？抱歉，在我的手術台上沒有新的任務。但是我會把您的名字留下以防我需要一些...細緻的提取工作。

eng: Up for new gigs?
trans: 有新的任務嗎？

eng: Let me know when you have completed the objectives :)
trans: 完成任務後請告訴我 :)

eng: Don't just look, buy something.
trans: 不要光是看，買點東西。

eng: Welcome to CircuitBreak Intelligence Division.
We pay top dollar for quality intel.
New file just came in. The client wants eyes where cameras can’t reach
Assets like you don’t stay alive for long. Earn while you can.
trans: 歡迎來到網路安全集團情報部
我們為優質情報支付頂價
剛收到新檔案。客戶需要攝像頭無法覆蓋的監視點
像你這樣的資產活不了多久 能賺就賺

locationDesc.eng: HQ for intelligence gathering and alleged "corporate espionage", if you want to make some quick eddies and experience and have the guns to show for it, sign up some contract with them.
locationDesc.trans: 從事情報蒐集及涉嫌「企業間諜活動」的總部，若想快速賺點歐元與經驗值並獲得槍械，可與他們簽訂一些合約

eng: Hey there, stranger! Are you ready for a little boost to help you on your journey today?
Welcome back, hon! I've got some exciting things for you to help you kick some virtual butt today.
Hey, you! Don't forget to check in with me every day for some sweet loots to make your gameplay even more epic.
Well, well, well...look who decided to log in today! I've got something that I think you're going to love.
Greetings, fellow adventurer! Let's see what kind of loot we can scavenge for you today.
Hey, there! Feeling lucky today? I've got some rewards that just might make your day a little brighter.
Howdy, partner! I'm feeling extra generous today. Don't miss out on some top-notch gear.
Welcome back, my friend! Let's see what kind of treasure we can dig up for you today.
Salutations! I hope you're ready for some loot that's out of this world today.
Good day, mate! It's always a pleasure to see you. Let's make today a good one with some fantastic rewards.
trans: 嘿，陌生人！您今天準備好得到一點旅程上的助力了嗎？
歡迎回來，親愛的！我有一些令人興奮的東西，可以幫助您揍些虛擬敵人。
嘿，您！不要忘記每天與我聯繫，以獲得一些甜美的戰利品，讓您的遊戲體驗更加棒棒。
嘿嘿嘿...看看今天決定上線的是誰！我有一些東西，我認為您會喜歡。
您好，冒險家！讓我們看看今天能為您搜刮到什麼樣的戰利品。
嘿！今天心情如何？我有一些獎勵，可能會讓您的一天更加美好。
您好，夥伴！我今天感覺十分慷慨。不要錯過一些最頂的裝備。
歡迎回來，我的朋友！讓我們看看今天能為您挖掘出什麼樣的寶藏。
安安！我希望您今天已經準備好迎接豐厚的物資了。
您好，夥伴！見到您總是很愉快。讓我們用一些驚人的獎勵把今天變得更美好。

description.eng: Take a survey to earn reward and give your feedback!
description.trans: 參加問卷調查以獲得獎勵並提供您的回饋！

eng: Welcome to my game! let me know if you have any feedbacks or bug report :)
trans: 歡迎來到我的遊戲！如果有任何意見或錯誤報告，請告訴我 :)

description.eng: A general store, you can purchase common items here
description.trans: 一般商店，您可以在這裡購買常見物品

eng: Hey there, welcome to my store!
trans: 嘿，歡迎來到我的商店！

eng: Aw, sugar, I'm all outta gigs for ya right now. But don't you worry, I'll have somethin' juicy for ya soon enough.
Sorry, hon, no quests on the menu for ya at the moment. But keep that shiny chrome eye open, 'cause I'll have somethin' worth your time real soon.
Aww, darlin', you caught me at a bad time. No quests to offer, but I promise I'll hook you up with some wicked adventures before you know it.
Sweetheart, my quest bank's runnin' a little dry right now. But keep swingin' by, 'cause I'll whip up somethin' spicy just for you soon.
trans: 啊，可惜，我現在沒有任何任務給您。但別擔心，我很快就會給您一個有趣的任務。
對不起，親愛的，目前沒有任務供您選擇。但請保持警覺，因為我很快就會有一些值得您花時間的事情。
啊，親愛的，您選錯了時間找我。我現在無法提供任何任務，但我保證在您知道之前，我就會給您一些驚人的冒險。
親愛的，我的任務銀行現在有點破產了。但有空就來看看，因為我很快就會為您準備一些好料。

eng: Could you do this for me?
trans: 您能為我做這件事嗎？

eng: Let me know when you have completed the objectives :)
trans: 完成目標後請讓我知道 :)

eng: Ready for action? Meet your new crewmates.
Time to level up. Your new crewmates are here.
The dream team? These are your new crewmates.
Welcome aboard. Meet the crewmates you'll be working with.
You're in good hands. These are your new crewmates.
New job, new crew. Meet your teammates.
Mission critical. These are your new crewmates.
New allies in the fight. Meet your crewmates.
Looking for a crew? You just found your new teammates.
Teamwork makes the dream work. Meet your new crewmates.
trans: 準備好行動了嗎？來見見您的新隊員。
升等的時候到了。您的新隊友已經抵達。
夢幻團隊？這是您的新隊員。
歡迎加入，這是您要與之合作的小組成員。
您會得到很好的照顧。這些是您的新隊員。
新工作，新隊伍。來認識您的隊友。
任務的關鍵。這些是您的新隊員。
在戰鬥中結識新盟友。與您的隊員會面。
在找隊友嗎？您找對地方了，這就是您的新戰友。
團隊合作才能實現夢想。來認識您的新隊友吧。

mercenaryButton.eng: I am looking for new crew members
mercenaryButton.trans: 我正在尋找新的隊伍成員

eng: Don't ask me how do I drink with this mask on, I just do.
Ah, a fellow believer. Join me for a spin? With the Goddess's blessing, we may reveal our fortunes today.
Hello there. They say with faith, the Goddess guides our balls of steel to victory. Shall we see if today is our day?
Good to see a new face in this sacred place. Trust in the Goddess, and maybe we'll both watch our fortunes rise with each play.
trans:
別問我戴著這個面具怎麼喝，我就是喝了。 
啊，同道中人！要不要一起來玩玩？在女神的祝福下，我們今天或許能揭開命運的奧秘。 
嘿，他們說只要有信仰，女神就會指引我們鋼鐵般的意志走向勝利。今天會是我們的一天嗎？讓我們拭目以待吧！ 
歡迎來到這神聖之地，看到新面孔真令人高興。相信女神，也許我們都能在每次遊戲中看到自己的運勢上升。

questButton.eng: Is there something I can help?
questButton.trans: 有什麼我可以幫忙的嗎？

description.eng: A local arms dealer, quality and price is guaranteed. You can upgrade and calibrate your items here too.
description.trans: 一位當地的軍火商，品質和價格都有保證。您還可以在這裡升級和校準您的物品。

eng: Wanna calibrate your irons?

You break it, I fix it.
 You break it again, I break you.
I'm the best in the business. You want something done right, you come to me.
trans: 想要校準您的吃飯傢伙嗎？

您弄壞它，我修理它。
您再弄壞它，我就修理您。
我是這行中的佼佼者。想要最好的，就來找我。

eng: Looking for a gig, huh? Sorry, nothing on my radar right now. Check back later, maybe I'll have something worth your while.
Listen up, slick, I'm all tapped out on quests. Come back when I've restocked.
Looking for action, huh? Well, tough luck. No jobs for you at the moment, slick.
trans: 在找工作嗎？抱歉，我目前沒有任何消息。稍後再來看看，也許我會有一些值得您關注的事情。
聽著，老兄，我已經沒有任務了。等我補貨後再來吧。
在找刺激嗎？唉，太衰了。目前沒有工作給您，帥哥。

eng: Up for new gigs?
trans: 有新的工作嗎？

eng: Let me know when you have completed the objectives :)
trans: 完成目標後請告知我 :)

eng: Seeking an edge in the city? You've come to the right place.
I'll fix you up real nice, no questions asked.
trans: 在城市中尋求優勢？您來對地方了。
我會幫您修好的，不問多餘問題。

description.eng: Here you can find all the shops and services in the city.
description.trans: 在這裡您可以找到城市中所有商店和服務。

confirmDepositMoneyDescription.eng: By purchasing ${money} from shop, you will be barred from depositing fund to gangs until you reach level ${level} or top up your account with ${unit}. Are you sure you want to proceed?
confirmDepositMoneyDescription.trans: 購買${money}後，您將無法向幫派存入資金，直到您達到${level}級或用${unit}為您的帳戶充值。您確定要繼續嗎？

cantSellLocked.eng: ${itemName} is locked, you must unlock it before selling it

disclaimer.eng: By completing this purchase, you agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy. All purchases are final. For support, please contact ${email}.

paymentErrorWithOrder.eng: Payment failed. If you were charged, contact support with order ID: ${orderId}

levelTooLow.trans: 您需要達到至少${level}級才能發動攻擊。

notEnoughPsychosis.trans: 您的網路狂躁症狀太高，無法執行此操作：${psychosis}

body.eng: Your psyche has restored to normal level, you may use your cybernetic abilities safely now.
body.trans: 你的心理狀態已恢復正常水平，現在可以安全地使用你的電驅路能力。

enablePowerSavingModeDescription.trans: 禁用某些資源密集型效果，如果您遇到UI延遲，請開啟此選項。

experimentalWebGLChromakeyDescription.eng: GPU-accelerated NPC animations are enabled by default. Disable this if you experience issues with NPC animations. Requires app reload to take effect
experimentalWebGLChromakeyDescription.trans: 預設已啟用 GPU 加速的 NPC 動畫。若遇到 NPC 動畫問題，請停用此功能。需重新載入應用程式才能生效。

description.eng: Only allow mails from players in your friend list to mail you

languageTip.eng: Language translation is contributable by the community on GitHub, if you would like to make edits for your language, click here to view our GitHub repository.

description.eng: Receive notification when your gang members send messages to gang chat

mention.trans: ${npc} 再一則推文內提起了您

autoDmgDesc.eng: Increases the damage of your auto attacks.
autoDmgDesc.trans: 增加你的自動攻擊傷害。

autoDmgMultDesc.eng: Increases the damage of your auto attacks.
autoDmgMultDesc.trans: 增加你的自動攻擊傷害。

blockChanceDesc.eng: Increases your chance to successfully block an attack when attempt to block.
blockChanceDesc.trans: 增加你嘗試格擋時成功格擋攻擊的機率。

blockStrengthDesc.eng: Increases the amount of damage blocked when attempt to block.
blockStrengthDesc.trans: 增加嘗試格擋時格擋的傷害量。

critChanceDesc.eng: Increases the chance of your attacks being critical.
critChanceDesc.trans: 增加你的攻擊有機會變成暴擊。

critDmgDesc.eng: Increases the damage of your critical attacks.

cyberneticResistanceDesc.eng: Increases your resistance against enemy using cybernetic attack.
cyberneticResistanceDesc.trans: 增加你對使用電驅攻擊的敵人的抗性。

damageMultDesc.eng: Increases the damage of your attacks.

dexDesc.eng: Increases your dexterity attribute, which in turn increases your damage with fire arm weapons.
dexDesc.trans: 增加你的敏捷屬性，進而增加你使用火器武器的傷害。

dmgDesc.eng: Increases the damage of your attacks.

energyResistanceDesc.eng: Increases your resistance against enemy using weapon.
energyResistanceDesc.trans: 增加你對使用武器的敵人的抗性。

escapeDesc.eng: Increases your chance to escape from enemies.
escapeDesc.trans: 增加你逃離敵人的機會。

headshotMultDesc.eng: Increases the damage of your headshots attacks

intDesc.eng: Increases your intelligence attribute, which in turn increases your damage with energy weapons.
intDesc.trans: 提升你的智力屬性，進而提升你的能量武器傷害。

inventorySlotDesc.trans: 增加你的最大倉庫空間。

kineticResistanceDesc.eng: Increases your resistance against enemy using kinetic attack.
kineticResistanceDesc.trans: 增加你對使用動能攻擊的敵人的抗性。

physicalResistanceDesc.eng: Increases your resistance against enemy using melee attack.
physicalResistanceDesc.trans: 增加你對使用近戰攻擊的敵人的抗性。

pvpDmgReceivedMultDesc.eng: Increases the damage you receive from players.
pvpDmgReceivedMultDesc.trans: 增加你受到玩家的傷害。

raidExpMult.trans: 藏身處突襲經驗值倍增器

raidExpMultDesc.eng: Increases the EXP you receive from hideout raids.
raidExpMultDesc.trans: 增加你從藏身處突襲中獲得的經驗值。

strDesc.eng: Increases your strength attribute, which in turn increases your damage with melee weapons.
strDesc.trans: 提升你的力量屬性，進而提升你的近戰武器傷害。

vitDesc.eng: Increases your vitality attribute, which in turn increases your maximum health.
vitDesc.trans: 提升你的活力屬性，進而增加你的最大生命值。

desc.eng: Receive fire damage every turn
Take ${percent}% less damage
Increases your defense
Recover health every turn
desc.trans: 將在每個回合恢復生命值

desc.eng: Increases the amount of loot from enemies and chests
desc.trans: 增加從敵人和寶箱獲得的戰利品數量

desc.eng: This player have been muted by the system.
Receive poison damage every turn
desc.trans: 中毒目標每回合會受到傷害

desc.eng: Deal ${percent}% more damage
You receive Hostile status when you attack players who does not have Hostile status, Takes ${percent} more damage from players and receives higher the punishment when you lost a fight
desc.trans: 當您攻擊沒有敵對狀態的玩家時，您會被標記為敵對狀態，受到玩家造成的傷害增加${percent}，並在失敗的戰鬥中受到更高的懲罰

desc.eng: While this status is active, you cannot be attacked by other players. This status will be removed when you attack another player.
desc.trans: 當此狀態啟用時，其他玩家無法攻擊你。當你攻擊其他玩家時，此狀態將被移除。

desc.eng: Increases the EXP you receive from hideout raids by ${percent}%
desc.trans: 增加你從藏身處突襲中獲得的經驗值${percent}%。

name.trans: 藏身處突襲經驗值倍增器 V

description.eng: If your ${inv} is full or one of the item has reached its max stack limit.\nPlease remove some stuff before picking up the loots.
description.trans: 如果你的${inv}已滿，或其中一項物品已達到最大堆疊限制。\n請在拾取戰利品之前先清空一些物品。

discardConfirmDescription.eng: Are you sure you want to discard all loots? this action is irreversible.
discardConfirmDescription.trans: 您確定要丟棄所有戰利品嗎？此操作是不可逆的。

description.eng: Clear up some space here so you can pickup the loots.
description.trans: 清理一些空間，這樣您就可以撿起戰利品了。

notEnoughMoney.eng: You don't have enough Eurodollar to buy purchase ${company}, current price: ${price}, needed: ${total}
notEnoughMoney.trans: 您沒有足夠的歐元來購買${company}，當前價格：${price}，所需：${total}

buy.eng: You can only sell this stock once per ${cooldown} minutes
buy.trans: 此股票每${cooldown}分鐘限售一次

sell.eng: You can only sell this stock once per ${cooldown} minutes
sell.trans: 此股票 ${cooldown} 分鐘內僅可賣出一次。

marketPriceWarning.eng: The actual price may differ slightly from the displayed price due to market spreads, timing, and demand.
marketPriceWarning.trans: 實際價格可能與顯示價格略有差異，由於市場價差、時點及需求等因素可能有所波動。

invalidPage.eng: Please enter a valid page number

pageDescription.eng: Discover the rich lore of Arclight City. Browse our collection of cyberpunk stories set in a dystopian future of corporate control and technological revolution.
pageDescription.trans: 探索幻光之城的豐富背景故事。瀏覽我們的收藏，這些故事設定在一個充滿企業控制和科技革命的反烏托邦未來。

pageTitle.eng: Arclight City Stories - Cyberpunk Lore Collection
pageTitle.trans: 幻光之城故事 - 賽博朋克傳說集

subtitle.eng: Discover the lore of the cyberpunk world
subtitle.trans: 探索賽博朋克世界的背景故事

pageDescription.eng: Read the cyberpunk story ${storyTitle} from the Arclight City cyberpunk universe.
pageDescription.trans: 請閱讀${storyTitle}，這是來自幻光之城的賽博朋克故事。

englishOnly.eng: Must be english letters and _ and numbers
englishOnly.trans: 必須是英文字母、_和數字

description2.trans: - 系統偵測到此帳號有作弊、駭客、自動化或濫用遊戲的行為。

description3.eng: - System has detected using of multiple accounts to gain an unfair advantage.
description3.trans: - 系統偵測到使用多個帳號以獲取不公平優勢。

description4.trans: 如果您覺得這是一個錯誤，請直接聯繫開發人員：ching.huang.dexter@gmail.com

locationNotUnlocked.trans: 你需要先解鎖${locationName}才能掌控此區域

maxTasks.trans: 您已達到任務的最大數量

noClan.eng: No clan has claimed this territory

description.trans: 這個動作將犧牲${minutes}分鐘的探索時間

tip.eng: Toggle the switches in correct sequence to unlock
tip.trans: 以正確的順序撥動開關以解鎖

cantAcceptWhileBusy.eng: You can\'t accept a trade while you are busy
cantAcceptWhileBusy.trans: 當您忙碌時，無法接受交易。

inviteCooldown.eng: You can only send a trade invite once every ${seconds} seconds
inviteCooldown.trans: 您每隔${seconds}秒才能傳送一次交易邀請。

description.eng: You have received a trade invite from ${inviter}.
description.trans: 您收到了來自${inviter}的交易邀請。

notInTrade.eng: You are not in a trade

tooManyItems.eng: You can\'t add more items to this trade
tooManyItems.trans: 您無法在此交易中增加更多物品。

tooMuchMoney.eng: You can\'t add more money to this trade
tooMuchMoney.trans: 您無法在此交易中增加更多的錢。

tradeNotFound.eng: This trade session has already been removed

unknownTrait.eng: This is an encrypted trait, use ${item} to decrypt and identify its true potential
unknownTrait.trans: 這是加密的屬性，用${item}解鎖，看清它的真面目。

locationNotCleared2.eng: Clear level ${level} ${dungeonType} stronghold to unlock the rewards
locationNotCleared2.trans: 通過清除${level}級${dungeonType}地城，解鎖獎勵。

rewardDescription.eng: Rewards are claimed after clearing the ${difficulty} stronghold, you must participate in defeating the boss for it to count.\nyou can only claim reward for each location once.
rewardDescription.trans: 在清除${difficulty}地城後才能獲得獎勵，你必須參與擊敗首領才能領取。\n每個地點的獎勵只能領取一次。

attack.eng: Hold and release at correct timing to perform attacks.
attack.trans: 按住並在正確的時機釋放以進行攻擊。

autoAttack.eng: Click here to toggle auto combat, which will allow you to attack enemies, use ability and heal automatically.
autoAttack.trans: 點擊這裡以切換自動戰鬥，這將使您能夠自動攻擊敵人、使用技能和自動治療。

autoFarm.eng: click here to start the auto gathering process
autoFarm.trans: 點擊這裡開始自動採集過程

autoFarm1.eng: You can use auto gather to gain rewards and exp passively while leaving your device on
autoFarm1.trans: 你可以使用自動採集來在設備開啟時被動獲得獎勵和經驗值。

autoFarmBoost.eng: Boost allow you to gain ${expPercent}% EXP and ${rewardPercent}% rewards, You can toggle to this to enable or disable boost during auto gather
autoFarmBoost.trans: 增益讓你獲得${expPercent}%經驗值和${rewardPercent}%獎勵，你可以切換此選項以在自動採集期間啟用或禁用增益。

autoFarmStop.eng: You can click here to stop at any time.
autoFarmStop.trans: 你可以隨時點擊這裡停止。

autoGatherRush.eng: Spam click here to fill the rush bar and get extra rewards!
autoGatherRush.trans: 狂點這裡填滿衝刺條，獲得額外獎勵！

backToMainPage.eng: You can always go back to main screen from here.
backToMainPage.trans: 你可以隨時從這裡回到主畫面。

backgroundTask1.eng: You have a slot for AFK tasks, click here to view it.
backgroundTask1.trans: 您有一個掛機任務的欄位，點擊這裡查看。

backgroundTask2.eng: Click here to start a task.

backpackClear.eng: Move items from backpack to your inventory to ensure you don't lose them during stronghold exploration.
backpackClear.trans: 將物品從背包移至您的倉庫，以確保在地城探索期間不會丟失它們。

crew1.eng: Click here to view your profile
crew1.trans: 點擊這裡查看您的個人資料。

crew2.eng: Click here to view your crew members
crew2.trans: 點擊這裡查看您的隊員。

crew3.eng: Click on one of the slots to assign a crew member
crew3.trans: 點擊其中一個插槽以分配機組人員

dailyQuest.eng: You have completed daily quests. open this tab to view them.
dailyQuest.trans: 您已完成每日任務。打開此選項卡以查看它們。

dailyQuestClaim.eng: Click here to claim your rewards.
dailyQuestClaim.trans: 點擊這裡領取你的獎勵。

deathItem.eng: You can buy back the items you lost from clinic.
deathItem.trans: 您可以從診所買回您失去的物品。

deathItem2.eng: Click here to view your lost items.
deathItem2.trans: 點擊這裡查看您失去的物品。

dungeon2.eng: Select the normal difficulty, you will get ${percent}% extra exp from enemies in the stronghold
dungeon2.trans: 選擇普通難度，您將從地城的敵人獲得額外${percent}%的經驗值

dungeonLevelChange.eng: You change level of the stronghold here if you want to fight stronger or weaker enemies.
dungeonLevelChange.trans: 如果你想要與更強或更弱的敵人戰鬥，可以在這裡調整地城的等級，。

dungeonStart.eng: Click here to enter the stronghold.

equipItem.eng: Click here to automatically equip items, you can also equip items manually from by clicking the equipment slots or within item details page.
equipItem.trans: 點擊此處自動裝備物品，也可以透過點擊裝備欄位或物品詳細資訊頁面手動裝備物品。

freeMerc1.eng: Click here for all kinds of benefits
freeMerc1.trans: 點擊這裡以獲得各種好處

freeMerc2.trans: 點擊這裡以獲得免費的${itemName}

freeMerc3.eng: Click back to return to main screen

heal.eng: Click here to assign healing items to quick slots.

leaveDungeon.eng: You can click here to leave the stronghold at any time.

localEnemy1.eng: Click here to scan for nearby enemies.
localEnemy1.trans: 點擊這裡掃描附近的敵人。

localEnemy2.eng: Click on an enemy to engage in battle.

locationChange.eng: You can travel to other locations with different levels from here
locationChange.trans: 您可以從這裡前往不同等級的其他地點

locationRewards.eng: You can claim these reward after you have defeated the boss in the Hard Difficulty stronghold at this location.
locationRewards.trans: 你可以在擊敗此地區的困難地城首領後領取這些獎勵。

locationTravelBtn.eng: Click here to travel to the location.

mercenary1.eng: Click here to view your mercenary contacts
mercenary1.trans: 點擊這裡查看傭兵聯絡人。

mercenary2.eng: Click here to recruit new mercenaries
mercenary2.trans: 點擊這裡招募新的傭兵。

mercenary3.eng: Click here to recruit 10 new mercenaries
mercenary3.trans: 點擊這裡招募10名新傭兵。

newsReaction.eng: React to news reports to receive Credits and gain points for your Corporation!
newsReaction.trans: 點擊新聞報導，領取信用點，替你的企業衝人氣！

quest.eng: Click here to view your quests.
quest.trans: 點擊這裡查看您的任務。

travelToLevel2.eng: Click here to travel to the next area where enemies are stronger and give more exp.
travelToLevel2.trans: 按此前往下一個區域，那裡的敵人更強大，並提供更多經驗值。

upgradeItem.eng: Click here to view your inventory.
upgradeItem.trans: 點擊這裡查看你的倉庫。

upgradeItemClickUpgrade.eng: Click "Upgrade" to level up this equipment.
upgradeItemClickUpgrade.trans: 點擊「升級」來提升這件裝備的等級。

upgradeItemDetails.eng: Click here to upgrade this item.

upgradeItemSlot.eng: Click on an equipment slot to view the item details.
upgradeItemSlot.trans: 點擊裝備欄位以查看物品詳情。

upgradeItemTab.eng: You can upgrade your items by using the following shards, try ${itemName} first, it will allow you to level up your equipments
upgradeItemTab.trans: 你可以使用以下碎片來升級你的物品，先試試${itemName}，它可以讓你的裝備升級。

useSkill.eng: Click here to command your mercenary to use skill.

title.eng: Select an item to assign to quick slot ${slotIndex}
title.trans: 選擇一個物品分配到快捷欄 ${slotIndex}

location.trans: 幻光之城 - 角色資料庫

alreadyTriedEscape.eng: You already tried to escape in this turn!

text2.eng: Your message will be sent directly to me via direct message, I will try to respond as soon as possible! ❤️

title.trans: 要取消所有背景任務嗎？

workInProgress.eng: This page is still work in progress

description.eng: Hello, I'm quickly updating the server to improve the game! \nIt's normal to see a reconnect or update screen for a few seconds.🚀\nApologies for any inconvenience and thanks for your patience.🙏
description.trans: 嗨，我正在快速更新伺服器以改善遊戲！\n在幾秒鐘內看到重新連接或更新畫面是正常的。🚀\n抱歉造成任何不便，感謝您的耐心。🙏

description.eng: Upgrade your backpack to increase the amount of items you can carry in strongholds.
description.trans: 升級您的背包以增加在地城中可以攜帶的物品數量。

levelNonTierMismatch.trans: 無法升等${itemTier}物品，${shardName}只能用於${requiredTier}物品。
